languages.text: The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.
languages.original_text: Охотник за головами может отметить любого противника в бою, наложив эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. Убивая добычу, охотник за головами получает суммирующийся бонус, который сохраняется до конца боя. Бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} этого противника (он показан римской цифрой на иконке врага): -I-II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} -III-IV: +(5 × ранг добычи)% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g} и +(2 × ранг добычи)% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя -V-VII: получение обоих бонусов В начале боя у охотника за головами есть 3 заряда Законной добычи.

traits.locale_text: The Hunter marks any enemy in combat as prey. Whenever the Hunter kills the target with a prey mark, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy difficulty tier (the roman figure on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Hunter maximum wounds as temporary wounds -III-IV: +(10 × prey difficulty tier)% critical hit damage and +(2 × prey difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat -V-VII: both of the above Hunt Down The Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

The Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as prey. Whenever the Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy difficulty tier (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Hunter's maximum wounds as temporary wounds -III-IV: +(10 × prey difficulty tier)% critical hit damage and +(2 × prey difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat -V-VII: both of the above Hunt Down The Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}可以将战斗中的任何敌人标记为{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}。每当赏金猎人杀死一名猎物时，都可以获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。加成效果取决于敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}（即敌人图标上的罗马数字）： - I-II：赏金猎人获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。 - III-IV：赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高（5×猎物难度等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击率提高（2×猎物难度等级）%，效果持续至战斗结束。 - V-VII：以上两项效果均生效。 击杀猎物在战斗开始时拥有3次使用次数。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: 猎人可以将战斗中的任何敌人标记为{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}。每当猎人杀死一名猎物时，都可以获得1层加成效果，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}加成效果取决于敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}（即敌人图标上的罗马数字）： - I-II：猎人获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。 - III-IV：猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}伤害提高（10×猎物难度等级）%，{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}提高（2×猎物难度等级）%，效果持续至战斗结束。 - V-VII：以上两项效果均生效。 击杀猎物在战斗开始时拥有3次使用次数。

languages.text: El cazarrecompensas puede marcar a cualquier enemigo del combate como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}. Cuando el cazarrecompensas mata a un objetivo marcado como presa, obtiene una bonificación acumulable hasta el final del combate. La bonificación depende del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo (el número romano en el icono del enemigo). -I-II : +25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cazarrecompensas como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño de impacto crítico{/g} y +(2 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de probabilidad de impacto crítico hasta el final del combate. -V-VII: las dos ventajas anteriores. Cazar a la presa tiene 3 cargas al empezar el combate.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} puede marcar a cualquier enemigo del combate como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}. Cuando el cazarrecompensas mata a un objetivo marcado como presa, obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable hasta el final del combate. La bonificación depende del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo (el número romano en el icono del enemigo). -I-II : +25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cazarrecompensas como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} -III-IV: +(10 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño de impacto crítico{/g} y +(2 × nivel de desafío de la presa) % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta el final del combate -V-VII: las dos ventajas anteriores Cazar a la presa tiene 3 cargas al empezar el combate.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}は戦闘中の任意の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}としてマークできる。バウンティハンターが獲物としてマークしたターゲットを倒すごとに、戦闘終了まで累積ボーナスを獲得する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}（敵アイコンに表示される数字）に応じる。 -I-II：ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の+25%が{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として付与される -III-IV：戦闘終了まで+（5 × 獲物の脅威度）% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}と +（2 × 獲物の脅威度）% クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が付与される -V-VII：上記の両方 獲物狩りが3チャージ所有した状態で戦闘を開始する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: ハンターは戦闘中の任意の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}としてマークできる。ハンターが獲物としてマークしたターゲットを倒すごとに、戦闘終了まで累積{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}（敵アイコンに表示される数字）に応じる。 -I-II：ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の+25%が{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として付与される -III-IV：戦闘終了まで+（10 × 獲物の脅威度）% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}ダメージと +（2 × 獲物の脅威度）% クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が付与される -V-VII：上記の両方 獲物狩りが3チャージ所有した状態で戦闘を開始する。

languages.text: Охотник за головами может отметить любого противника в бою, наложив эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. Убивая добычу, охотник за головами получает суммирующийся бонус, который сохраняется до конца боя. Бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} этого противника (он показан римской цифрой на иконке врага): -I-II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} -III-IV: +(5 × ранг добычи)% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g} и +(2 × ранг добычи)% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя -V-VII: получение обоих бонусов В начале боя у охотника за головами есть 3 заряда Законной добычи.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: Охотник может отметить любого противника в бою, наложив эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. Убивая добычу, охотник получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g}, который сохраняется до конца боя. Бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровня сложности{/g} противника (он показан римской цифрой на иконке врага): -I-II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} -III-IV: +(10 × уровень сложности цели)% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому{/g} урону и +(2 × уровень сложности цели)% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя -V-VII: получение обоих бонусов В начале боя у охотника есть 3 заряда Законной добычи.

Охотник может отметить любого противника в бою, наложив эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}. Убивая добычу, охотник получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g}, который сохраняется до конца боя. Бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровня сложности{/g} противника (он показан римской цифрой на иконке врага): -I-II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} -III-IV: +(10 × уровень сложности цели)% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому{/g} урону и +(2 × уровень сложности цели)% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя -V-VII: получение обоих бонусов В начале боя у охотника есть 3 заряда Законной добычи.

languages.text: Der Kopfgeldjäger kann im Kampf beliebige Feinde als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markieren. Immer wenn er ein als Beute markiertes Ziel tötet, erlangt er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren Bonus, dessen Höhe sich an der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} (der römischen Zahl auf dem Symbol des Feindes) richtet: -I-II: +25 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Trefferschaden{/g} und +(2 × Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe) % kritische Trefferchance bis zum Ende des Kampfes. -V-VII: Beide der obenstehenden. Jagd auf die Beute machen hat bei Kampfbeginn 3 Ladungen.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} kann im Kampf beliebige Feinde als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markieren. Immer wenn er ein als Beute markiertes Ziel tötet, erlangt er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}, dessen Höhe sich an der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} (der römischen Zahl auf dem Symbol des Feindes) richtet: -I-II: +25 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} -III-IV: +(10 × Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Trefferschaden{/g} und +(2 × Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe) % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes -V-VII: Beide der obenstehenden Jagd auf die Beute machen hat bei Kampfbeginn 3 Ladungen.

languages.text: Au combat, le chasseur de primes peut désigner un ennemi en tant que {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}. Chaque fois qu'il élimine une telle proie, il obtient un bonus cumulable qui dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus dépend du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi (niveau représenté par un chiffre romain sur son icône) : -I-II : +25 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} du chasseur de primes transformées en {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. -III-IV : +(5 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et +(2 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de chances de coup critique jusqu'à la fin du combat. -V-VII : les deux bonus précédents. Traque de la proie s'accompagne de 3 charges au début du combat.
languages.original_text: The Bounty Hunter may mark any enemy in combat as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}. Whenever the Bounty Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon): -I-II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. -III-IV: +(5 × prey's difficulty tier)% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +(2 × prey's difficulty tier)% critical hit chance until the end of combat. -V-VII: both of the above. Hunt Down the Prey has 3 charges at the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: Au combat, le Chasseur peut désigner un ennemi comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}. Lorsqu'il élimine une cible désignée comme une proie, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus dépend du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi (niveau représenté par un chiffre romain sur l'icône de celui-ci) : - I-II : +25 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} du Chasseur transformées en {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} - III-IV : +(10 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} et +(2 × niveau de difficulté de la proie) % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin du combat - V-VII : les deux bonus précédents Traque de la Proie s'accompagne de 3 charges au début du combat.
